PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1990-21561990-09-270,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 1990-4/194 of February 1, 1990, which will increase the dollar amount which may be paid to offset some of the legal fees incurred by certain witnesses appearing before the COMMISSION of INQUIRY into the AIR ONTARIO CRASH at Dryden, Ontario, as recommended by the Commissioner, the Hon. Mr. Justice Virgil P. Moshansky.
